tweet.text: In newly released #FRUS, read the Carter administration’s deliberations concerning the former Shah of Iran’s presence in the U.S. and other countries following the 1979 capture of U.S. hostages at the U.S. Embassy in Tehran: https://t.co/fDVWjWAqPP https://t.co/ZktDFykxqI
